website_summaries.verdict: An elevated, multi-angle play stand that makes playing in tabletop mode comfortable.
pros: Stand has all the proper spaces to allow you to charge while you play
Provides a wider variety of viewing angles than its competitors
Stand is elevated to provide even further viewing comfort
Folds up easily for compact storage
The Joto stand is also compatible with a number of phones and tablets
cons: Limited ventilation on the back of the stand

customer_reviews.title: This is good workaround if you get to these somehow.
customer_reviews.text: The simple concept and design; all Switch plugged in while display. With the Dock and bigger screen TV /HDMI is better solution; however this is good workaround if you get to these somehow.
customer_reviews.author: Richard C

customer_reviews.title: Good Stand!
customer_reviews.text: It fits just right and makes the game easier for the kids to not leave it on the floor!
customer_reviews.author: Helen Kashiwa

customer_reviews.title: Much better than it looks.
customer_reviews.text: For the price compared to many other stands it's actually VERY good. It's also far more flexible than the pictures make it out to be. Folding it takes almost no space at all therefore it isn't a nuisance much like the Wii U's stand which is a major plus. A bit on the small side but the flexibility does make up for that flaw. Worthy purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe Sanguinet

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. It's universal for not only the Switch
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. It's universal for not only the Switch, but for my iPad Pro, IPad mini, iPhone 7+ and my iPod as well. I use it daily!! Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: ean kremer

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: awesome product got here very quickly and is great for the switch highly recommended perfect five stars a wonderful investment
customer_reviews.author: ANewSong

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great for the switch. Good buy and good price
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: It was a bit smaller than I expected, but it works perfectly with my switch. Very compact and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Love how compact it is!
customer_reviews.text: Great compact Nintendo Switch holder. I love how many different angles it gives me. It holds my Switch firmly and folds up really flat. It just barely doesn't fit in my case which is not a problem as I can just carry it. But it doesn't have a charging cable hole to go through it. As one who's charger space and wall outlets are limited, this does make it slightly more difficult and requires some thought, but it is manageable and doesn't detract from the rating.
customer_reviews.author: OtakusChaosTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Stand for my son. He said it's great! He's very particular and he's happy with it, which is an incredible review!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Leach

customer_reviews.title: A better way to play on the go
customer_reviews.text: The stand is solid. It holds the switch nicely in place, and has an opening for the charger to connect while you play. A stand is a must have if you are gaming on the go. It does feel bigger than necessary, but still small enough to travel with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Izaak

customer_reviews.title: Great, very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for it's price, portable and works well. I bought it so I can play with the switch while charging it and I'm very satisfied with how the console fits.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits switch
customer_reviews.text: Just got for son for Christmas. Looks like good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Quality of the plastic isn't the best, but it's cheap and works, so I can't really complain much.
customer_reviews.author: Skyler S.

customer_reviews.title: but isnt the best stand out there
customer_reviews.text: It works, but isnt the best stand out there, ended up buying another one that was a bit better quality and less of a footprint. This one takes up way to much desk space, and for my setup that is at a premium.
customer_reviews.author: MrBuysAlot

customer_reviews.title: works well for what it is....
customer_reviews.text: though it is very simple plastic. It fits and works very well and allows for charging while playing.
customer_reviews.author: Alfred L Lemmon II

customer_reviews.title: ... flips down to hold the Switch to allow for better venting. Other than this required modification
customer_reviews.text: I cut a hole out where the little flap flips down to hold the Switch to allow for better venting. Other than this required modification, the stand is quite alright.
customer_reviews.author: squirrelchew

product_meta.title: Nintendo Switch Stand Compact Playstand, JOTO Foldable Multi Angle Holder Play Stand for Nintendo Switch 2017 -Black
product_meta.description: Unique designed play stand for Nintendo Switch 2017
feature_bullets: Durable ABS plastic play stand for Nintendo Switch
Supports multiple viewing angles and quickly set-up; Suits your most comfortable playing position
Allows you to play while charging in stand mode
Foldable design, convenient to carry around or store
Sturdy and durable grip tabs to keep your device in place at comfortable playing angle
